name: Turn Back the Clocks 2
description:
Made in zero hours for #0hgame. From 2am to 2am during the daylight savings time period.

http://0hgame.eu/

Update - Clocks now change from 2am to 1am when you click on them, and a counter was added to track total number of clocks clicked.

Subscribe on YouTube | Follow on Twitter | Like on Facebook
